verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"No <S%H551>doubt,<s%> but you are the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> shall die with <S%H4191>you.<s%>
<S%H1571>But<s%> I have <S%H3824>understanding<s%> as well as <S%H5307>you;<s%> I am not inferior to <S%H3644>you.<s%> Yes, who doesn't know such things as these?

I am like one who is a <S%H7814>joke<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H7121>I,<s%> who called on <S%H433>God,<s%> and he <S%H6030>answered.<s%> The <S%H6662>just,<s%> the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> man is a <S%H7814>joke.<s%>
In the <S%H6248>thought<s%> of him who is at <S%H7600>ease<s%> there is <S%H3940>contempt<s%> for <S%H937>misfortune.<s%> It is <S%H3559>ready<s%> for them whose <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4571>slips.<s%>

The <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7703>robbers<s%> <S%H7951>prosper.<s%> Those who <S%H7264>provoke<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> are <S%H987>secure,<s%> who <S%H935>carry<s%> their <S%H433>God<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
<S%H199>"But<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> the <S%H929>animals,<s%> <S%H3384>now,<s%> and they shall teach <S%H5775>you;<s%> the birds of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and they shall tell <S%H5046>you.<s%>
Or <S%H7878>speak<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H1709>you.<s%> The fish of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall declare to <S%H5608>you.<s%>
Who <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know that in all <S%H3027>these,<s%> the hand of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has done <S%H6213>this,<s%>
in whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> is the <S%H5315>life<s%> of every living <S%H2416>thing,<s%> and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of all <S%H376>mankind?<s%>
<S%H241>Doesn't<s%> the ear <S%H974>try<s%> <S%H4405>words,<s%> even as the <S%H2441>palate<s%> <S%H2938>tastes<s%> its <S%H400>food?<s%>
With <S%H3453>aged<s%> men is <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
"With God is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1369>might.<s%> He has <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
<S%H2040>Behold,<s%> he breaks down, and it <S%H1129>can't<s%> be built again. He <S%H5462>imprisons<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> and there can be no <S%H6605>release.<s%>
<S%H6113>Behold,<s%> he withholds the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and they dry <S%H3001>up.<s%> <S%H7971>Again,<s%> he sends them out, and they <S%H2015>overturn<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
With him is <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8454>wisdom.<s%> The <S%H7683>deceived<s%> and the deceiver are <S%H7686>his.<s%>
He <S%H3212>leads<s%> <S%H3289>counselors<s%> away <S%H7758>stripped.<s%> He makes <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H1984>fools.<s%>
He <S%H6605>loosens<s%> the <S%H4148>bond<s%> of <S%H4428>kings.<s%> He <S%H631>binds<s%> their <S%H4975>waist<s%> with a <S%H232>belt.<s%>
He <S%H3212>leads<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> away <S%H7758>stripped,<s%> and overthrows the <S%H386>mighty.<s%>
He <S%H5493>removes<s%> the <S%H8193>speech<s%> of those who are <S%H539>trusted,<s%> and takes <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H2940>understanding<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>
He pours <S%H937>contempt<s%> on <S%H5081>princes,<s%> and <S%H7503>loosens<s%> the <S%H4206>belt<s%> of the <S%H4206>strong.<s%>
He <S%H1540>uncovers<s%> deep <S%H6013>things<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and brings <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%> the shadow of <S%H6757>death.<s%>
He <S%H7679>increases<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and he <S%H6>destroys<s%> <S%H7849>them.<s%> He enlarges the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and he leads them <S%H5148>captive.<s%>

He takes <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%> from the <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and causes them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H8414>wilderness<s%> where there is no <S%H1870>way.<s%>
They <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%> without <S%H216>light.<s%> He makes them <S%H8582>stagger<s%> like a drunken <S%H7910>man.<s%>
